function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Cutting down on marketing and innovation budgets during a crisis","Impact":"Missed opportunity to stand out from competitors and engage with consumers","Mitigation":"Investing in technology and marketing during a crisis","Technologies":"Digital retail innovations, online platforms","People":"Retailers, consumers","Owner":"Retailers, marketing and innovation teams"},{"Description":"Implementing new technologies without considering the realistic and beneficial aspects","Impact":"Wasted investment and potential negative impact on the business","Mitigation":"Conducting thorough research on the direct and indirect return on technology investments","Technologies":"Market research tools, cost-benefit analysis software","People":"Businesses, decision-makers","Owner":"Business management, research and development teams"},{"Description":"Inadequate integration between online and brick-and-mortar retailing","Impact":"Inability to meet customers' needs effectively and compete with larger online retailers","Mitigation":"Integration of online and physical retail platforms, implementation of customer relationship management systems","Technologies":"Online retail platforms, customer relationship management (CRM) software","People":"Small/local retailers, consumers","Owner":"Retailers, business development teams"}]}
